system.useTime:
All Daemonhosts have: Baneful Presence (WP Bonus / 2), Brutal Charge (3), Daemonic (4), Dark-Sight, Deadly Natural Weapons (Claws), From Beyond, Size (5), and Stuff of Nightmares
Unbound: Fear (4), Hoverer (5), Unnatural Strength (+5).               Once-Bound: Fear (3), Hoverer (4), Unnatural Strength (+4).       
Twice-Bound: Fear (3), Hoverer (3), Unnatural Strength (+4).    Thrice-Bound: Fear (2), Hoverer (2), Unnatural Strength (+3)
Daemonhost Natural Weapons have Penetration 2 and inflict Rending Damage. Their Hoverer Trait does not require any action to be expended to remain hovering.
